text: Grapeshot: deals 1 damage to any target, copy for each spell during boss' turn. Repeat {x} time(s).
Lightning Helix: each player deals {3} damage to any target. Boss gains {amount*p} life.
Wall of Swords: Boss summons {xp} 3/5 defender(s) with flying
Bargain: Boss gets 7 life, each player draws a card.
